name: interlibrary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between two or more libraries: Studies were obtained at two Canadian universities and through interlibrary loans. A colleague made the inter-library computer search and gathered the relevant literature for this study.
More examplesFewer examplesThe library stocks are widely accessible on the interlibrary loan system.Lack of local facilities would be a poor excuse in times of interlibrary loans and internet access.There is an argument to be made for extending the idea of interlibrary loan to digital collections.We thank the staff of the National Library for their help in locating inter-library materials.
